text: On Sunday 29 April 2001 the United Kingdom Government held a census.Census paints portrait of ageing UK This was the 19th UK Census. United Kingdom Census 2001 was started by the Office for National Statistics in England and Wales, the General Register Office for Scotland and the Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency. It was the first census to ask people in England, Scotland and Wales about their religion. ==References== == Other websites == *Census 2001 website (England and Wales) *Scotland *Northern Ireland *The Census Order 2000 (England and Wales) Category:2001 in the United Kingdom Category:Censuses in the United Kingdom
title: 2001 United Kingdom census
